output:
Windows on the darkness of my mind
Tears like mirror in my eye
Shadows like memory of life
I forget my name, it goes away
I try to find queens and kings to play
I try to find spades and clubs to play
Rim to share and nightmares
Rim to share, night to wear
Yellow is the color of the night
Moon and stars show the light
Let the wings of butterfly
I sleep like a fog in the sky
I try to find ladies and lords to play
I try to find heralds and diamonds to play
Rim to share and nightmares
Rim to share, night to wear
Rim to share
Thanks for watching!
